review:
Dr.Jitender has been my dental surgeon for the past over a decade.He is an excellent surgeon and knows his job well.I have always felt great level of comfort visiting him for my check ups and treatment. And of course he has the skills and patience to handle difficult patients like me . Lastly, his clinic has hygienic environment and has all the latest equipments.
I highly recommend him for patients of all ages.
I am satisfied with  the treatment  made by the doctor.   He attended me timely according to the appointment fixed by him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Cosmetic Filling,Dental Crowns,Tooth Air Polishing,
review: Doctor Jitender Dahiya is very calm, cool and always smiling who give utmost attention to his patients. Dr Dahiya is very experienced and reputed doctor in this area and I’m highly satisfied for treatment given to me.

review: Perfect working/services for requisite treatment. It seems absolutely normal after RCT and other procedures, just like natural 20year back. It is worth to visit him for any dental issue. He perfect dental professional to be considered.
It was really a good experience to select dr. Jitender dhaiya for our dental issue as the manner in which he deals with the problem and make the patient feel safe and comfortable is outstanding.
